response.value:
The aim of this report is to know the pros and cons of the transport facilities , two of which are bikes and trains. This selection is based on most of student of my university.

Most Popular Transport

Bikes are popular means of transportation for several reasons. Firstly there are cost-effective as they do not required fuel or expensive maintenance. Bikes also provide a great way to exercise while commuting, promoting physical fitness and healthier lifestyle. They are environmentally friendly, producing zero emissions and reducing traffic congestion. While bikes have numerous advantages, they also come with a few disadvantages. One of it is the limited speeds compare to motorized transport option. Bikes are more slower ,especially when traveling long distance and also after finish biking we also have to change a new clothes if there are something we have to do after driving all day because the smell and the smoke when we pass the streets may make us feel uncomfortable. Lastly bike also lack of protection from accident compared to those using cars or train.

Second Most Popular Transport

﻿Trains have several advantages as means of transportation. Firstly, they offer a high level of comfort and convenience with spacious seating, restroom and food service which make a good environment for training. There are generally punctual and reliable compared to the another transportation. The last things is the stations is near which makes traveling easier. However trans also have some disadvantages. One major is potential for overcrowding during peak travel time, which is lead to discomfort and inconvenience. Trains may also be delayed or cancelled due to maintenance issues. Additionally trains tickets can sometime be more expensive than other modes of transportation.

Recommendation

Here are some recommendation for university to improve . The first thing is you have to starts a lesson later to avoid rush hour. Secondly, make a safe place for bike to make sure the students will go to university safely. Third, making a plan and prepared more time to make sure that students can come on time. Last, Changing rooms for students.

data.stimulus:
You are going to write a report for your University.

You should…

  • Write about the TWO most popular means of transportation used by students
  • Discuss the advantages AND disadvantages
  • Make some recommendations to the university
 

Analyse the information in the table below:

 

Write your report using  ALL the information in the table.

Write COMPLETE sentences. Do NOT use bullet points.

Use at least ONE of your own ideas in the recommendations section.

 

Follow the report structure you can see below:

 

 

Write your report in the box below. Start with: 

The aim of this report is to ...
